name: From Above (Trampod, betacaroten)
description:
You are a pilot exploring new frontiers in uncharted parts of seas.

Your objective is to draw a map of the islands below you.

Controls:

  • W - increase speed
  • S - decrease speed
  • D - turn right
  • A - turn left
  • E - open/close map
  • LMB - draw into map

(Endgame screanshots are saved to FromAbove_Data.)
